description: Form input prefix for text. Same as hint-text color.

Name: vads-label-color-on-light
description: Form label text color. Same as base color.

description: Form label hint-text color. Only passes contrast ratio on a white background.

description: Background highlight color when a standard link is active. Same as the background color in the hover state.

description: Color of the modal background that hides the content behind the modal. Uses uswds-system-color-gray-cool-70 at .8 opacity.

description: Items in the process list that are in a pending state use this color.

description: Background color of the sidenav.

description: Flagship mobile app toolbar background
